section.title: Leap.Unity.IProgressView Interface Reference

para.para: This interface describes a generic way to update the progress of an action.

listitem.para: Clears the progress view. Is called if the action has been completed or canceled.
void DisplayProgress (string title, string info, float progress)
Updates the progress view with some title text, information, and a progress percentage that ranges from 0 to 1.
